creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
markings: TC verso frame: Fredericks & Freiser gallery
signed: BR margin, black ink: L. PETERSON 22
text: Portrait of a Black man, sitting in a garden. Behind him is a hat laid on the upper, back corner of a bench. The red hat is in the mid-ground of the portrait, to the left of the figure. In the background, to the right, slightly behind the man is a building. Flowers frame the lower portion of the portrait.
title: The Red Hat
